node.detail_zh: 患者居於屯門紫田村， 1 月 29 日開始咳嗽，兩日後有痾嘔。他於 2 月 5 日、8 日看過不同醫生， 2 月 12 日到屯門醫院急症室求診。他曾在 1 月 30 日與 12 名家人共膳，其中一名姻親為第 #47 宗個案患者。無外遊紀錄。患者從事保險業，發病後有接觸過 3 名客戶。
node.detail_en: The patient lives in Tsz Tin Tsuen, Tuen Mun. He started coughing on Jan 29 and developed diarrhea two days later. He visited different doctors on Feb 5 and Feb 8 respectively. He then sought treatment at the Accident and Emergency Department (A&E) of Tuen Mun Hospital on Feb 12. On Jan 30, he had meals with 12 family members, among whom was patient no. 47. The patient has not travelled outside Hong Kong recently. The patient works in insurance and had contacts with three clients after showing symptoms.

node.remarks_zh: 1 月 29 日開始咳嗽，兩日後有痾嘔；1 月 30 日與 12 人（包括第 47 宗患者）一同出席家庭聚會
node.remarks_en: Developed cough since Jan 29, followed by vomiting and diarrhoea twos days later; attended a family banquet with 12 other persons, including patient no. 47, at home on Jan 30
